title: Replacing stolen pixel - advice wanted on how to avoid having to set up every app etc. if possible.
content: As stated I need to replace a stolen pixel. I am looking for advice on how to avoid having to set up every app etc. if possible on the new pixel. Is this just something I specify when I order the phone or....? Thanks for any and all help.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
